item.title: Working with Github Pages
item.description: I’m starting to work on this blog again to get away from the WordPress way of working with things, that is, to have someone else set up the MySQL and PHP and hope it’s all the right version, and hope that updates don’t break modules, and hope that a PHP upgrade doesn’t cost extra in hosting support fees, and hope that… well, you get the idea. I originally started with a short article about deploying to Github with Hugo, however a few things had changed since then:
